reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 543/20: EXTENSION OF TEMPORARY SUSPENSION PERIOD

content.section: Extension of temporary suspension period for certain provisions
content.content: 1. For the purposes of sections 1, 3, 4, 6 and 7 of the Schedule to the Act, the temporary suspension period is extended to end on September 30, 2023. O. Reg. 543/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 252/21, s. 1; O. Reg. 691/21, s. 1; O. Reg. 474/22, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purposes of sections 1, 3, 4, 6 and 7 of the Schedule to the Act, the temporary suspension period is extended to end on September 30, 2023. O. Reg. 543/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 252/21, s. 1; O. Reg. 691/21, s. 1; O. Reg. 474/22, s. 1.

content.section: Extension of temporary suspension period for certain provisions
content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
